hint::English: Enter before you call the KI, using the KI information forms provided

hint::English: Enter before you call the KI, using the KI information forms provided

name: iset_code
label: What is this settlement's ISET code provided on the KI information form?
hint::English:
An ISET code is a set of three letters, followed by three numbers. For example AAA_000

Enter before you call the KI, using the KI information forms provided

name: location
label: Where is this settlement located?
hint::English: Enter before you call the KI, using the KI information forms provided

name: intro
label: My name is [[name]] and I work for ACTED. On behalf of OFDA, we are conducting an assessment of informal settlements across Afghanistan so that the humanitarian community can better understand these settlements, their service access, and each community's needs, especially in relation to the covid-19 emergency. The questions are specifically about settlement demographics, key infrastructure available, the quality of these infrastructure, and how access and quality of infrastructure has changed in the last 30 days. Any information that you provide will be confidential. This is voluntary and you can choose not to answer any or all of the questions; however we hope that you will participate since your views about and knowledge of your community are important. Participation in the survey does not have any impact on whether you or your settlement receive assistance. Do you have any questions?

name: consent
label: Do you consent to participate in this survey?

name: ki_info
label: Key Informant Information

name: ki_gender
label: What is the gender of the KI?

name: ki_age
label: How old are you?
hint::English: Read options, select one

name: popn_types
label: Population Types

name: popn_note
label: First I will ask about the population groups living in this settlement. Please do your best to estimate their size.

name: iset_population
label: Is the population living in the settlement made up of only migrants (e.g. IDPs, returnees, refugees, etc), or is it sharing the same space with the host community?

name: migrant_population
label: Which migrant populations are living in this site?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply

name: idp_hhs
label: How many IDP households are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, an IDP is an Afghan National who has been forced to leave their homes in the last 6 months.

name: idp_indvl
label: How many IDP individuals are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, an IDP is an Afghan National who has been forced to leave their homes in the last 6 months.
constraint_message::English: IDP individuals must be equal to or larger than the number of IDP households reported

name: prolonged_hhs
label: How many PROLONGED IDP households are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, a prolonged IDP is an Afghan National who was forced to leave their homes between 6 months and 2 years ago.

name: prolonged_indvl
label: How many PROLONGED IDP individuals are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, a prolonged IDP is an Afghan National who was forced to leave their homes between 6 months and 2 years ago.
constraint_message::English: Prolonged IDP individuals must be equal to or larger than the number of prolonged IDP households reported

name: protracted_hhs
label: How many PROTRACTED IDP households are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, a protracted IDP is an Afghan National who was forced to leave their homes a minimum of 2 years ago, and have since restablished their lives in new locations. They are now considered part of the host community.

name: protracted_indvl
label: How many PROTRACTED IDP individuals are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, a protracted IDP is an Afghan National who was forced to leave their homes a minimum of 2 years ago, and have since restablished their lives in new locations. They are now considered part of the host community.
constraint_message::English: Protracted IDP individuals must be equal to or larger than the number of Protracted IDP households reported

name: idp_3mo_hhs
label: How many of these IDP households (regardless of displacement length) arrived in the last 3 months?
constraint_message::English: Must be less than the number of IDP households reported living in the settlement (recent, prolonged and protracted)

name: idp_prov_origin
label: From which province have most IDPs in this settlement come in the last 3 months?

name: idp_dist_origin
label: From which district have most IDPs in this settlement come in the last 3 months?

name: refugee_hhs
label: How many refugee households are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, a refugee is a national of another country who has been displaced and are now residing in Afghanistan.

name: refugee_indvl
label: How many refugee individuals are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, a refugee is a national of another country who has been displaced and are now residing in Afghanistan.
constraint_message::English: Refugee individuals must be equal to or larger than the number of Refugee households reported

name: returnee_hhs
label: How many returnee households are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, a returnee is an Afghan National that has returned to Afghanistan after living other countries.

name: returnee_indvl
label: How many returnee individuals are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, a returnee is an Afghan National that has returned to Afghanistan after living other countries.
constraint_message::English: Returnee individuals must be equal to or larger than the number of Returnee households reported

name: returnee_origin
label: From where did MOST of these returnees travel from?

name: returnee_paki_prov
label: What was the main province from which most returnees from Pakistan came?

name: returnee_iran_prov
label: What was the main province from which most returnees from Iran came?

name: returnee_3mo_hhs
label: How many of these returnee households arrived in the last 3 months?
constraint_message::English: Must be less than the number of returnee households reported living in the settlement

name: recentreturn_challenge
label: Have any of these returnees faced challenges in integrating into your settlement?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'none' and any other option

name: recentreturn_challenge_other
label: Specify other

name: economic_hhs
label: How many economic migrant households are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, an economic migrant is an Afghan National who left their homes by choice in order to seek employment or obtain money or resources. They did NOT leave home due to the threat of violence, human right violations, or man-made disasters.

name: economic_indvl
label: How many economic migrant individuals are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, an economic migrant is an Afghan National who left their homes by choice in order to seek employment or obtain money or resources. They did NOT leave home due to the threat of violence, human right violations, or man-made disasters.
constraint_message::English: Economic migrant individuals must be equal to or larger than the number of economic migrant households reported

name: nomad_hhs
label: How many nomad (Kuchi) households are living in the settlement permanently?
hint::English: For this assessment, a nomad is an Afghan national that traditionally does not have a fixed home or location of living, and regularly moves throughout the country as part of their livelihood.

name: nomad_indvl
label: How many nomad (Kuchi) individuals are living in the settlement permanently?
hint::English: For this assessment, a nomad is an Afghan national that traditionally does not have a fixed home or location of living, and regularly moves throughout the country as part of their livelihood.
constraint_message::English: Nomad individuals must be equal to or larger than the number of nomad households reported

name: host_hhs
label: How many host community households are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, host community individuals are not displaced, and identify as part of the community within which the informal settlement resides.

name: host_indvl
label: How many host community individuals are living in the settlement?
hint::English: For this assessment, host community individuals are not displaced, and identify as part of the community within which the informal settlement resides.
constraint_message::English: Host community individuals must be equal to or larger than the number of host community households reported

name: vulnerability
label: Vulnerabilty

name: vuln_note
label: Now I will ask about at-risk individuals and households living in this settlement. Please do your best to estimate their size.

name: disability
label: Approximately how many households in your settlement contain members that have a disability that prevents them from completing everyday tasks?
hint::English: An individual may have a disability if they have difficulty seeing, hearing, walking or climbing steps, communicating or understanding conversation, or challenges with caring for themselves.
constraint_message::English: Number entered must be less than total housholds reported living in the settlement

name: chronic_ill
label: Approximately how many households in your settlement contain members that have a chronic illness that prevents them from completing everyday tasks?
hint::English: Examples of chronic illness: heart disease, hypertension, diabetes, chronic respiratory diseases, cancer, moderate to severe asthma
constraint_message::English: Number entered must be less than total housholds reported living in the settlement

name: elderly
label: Approximately how many INDIVIDUALS in your settlement are 60 years of age or older
constraint_message::English: Number entered must be less than total individuals reported living in the settlement

name: female_hoh
label: Approximately how many households in your settlement have female heads of household?
constraint_message::English: Number entered must be less than total housholds reported living in the settlement

name: ethnic_groups
label: What ethnic groups comprise this settlement?
hint::English: Select as many groups as are applicable

name: ethnic_groups_other
label: Specify other

name: intentions
label: Intentions

name: five_years
label: Have most households in your settlement lived here more than 5 years?

name: relocate_plan
label: Do any residents of this settlement plan to move elsewhere within the next month?

name: relocate_pushpull
label: For what reason are households planning to move elsewhere?

name: relocate_pushpull_other
label: Specify other

name: covid19
label: COVID-19

name: covid_note
label: Now I would like to ask you about recent health concerns regarding the new coronavirus, including what residents in your settlement are doing and if their  behaviour has changed.

name: covid_aware
label: Are residents in this settlement aware of the new coronavirus disease, also known as COVID-19?

name: covid_reponse
label: Site is aware of COVID-19

name: covid_concern
label: Is the new coronavirus disease an important concern for MOST residents of your settlement?

name: covid_prevent
label: Are MOST settlement residents aware of prevention methods for the new coronavirus disease?

name: covid_info
label: From where / from whom are MOST settlement residents getting their information about coronavirus and prevention?

name: covid_info_other
label: Specify other

name: covid_safeprac
label: What actions are MOST settlement residents taking to PREVENT EXPOSURE to the coronavirus?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'none' and any other option

name: covid_safeprac_other
label: Specify other

name: covid_action
label: What actions would MOST settlement residents take if they THOUGHT THEY HAD coronavirus?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'none' or 'don't know' and any other option

name: covid_action_other
label: Specify other

name: covid_discriminate
label: Have ANY residents of your community been discriminated or neglected by their family or community as a result of Covid-19?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'none' and any other option

name: covid_discriminate_other
label: Specify other

name: discrimate_result
label: What have been the consequences?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply

name: discrimate_result_other
label: Specify other

name: wash
label: WASH

name: wash_note
label: Now I would like to ask about different water, hygiene, and sanitation sources available in your settlement, and how they are used by residents.

name: water_point
label: Is there an accessible collective water point within 2km of your settlement?

name: water_point_no
label: How many functional collective water points (including taps) are available for settlement use within 2km?

name: tap_sanitize
label: Has the infrastructure at these functional collective water points (e.g. handle of handpump, tap) been cleaned or disinfected on a daily basis in the last 7 days?

name: wash_gbv
label: Are these water points safely and easily accessible to women and girls?
hint::English: For example, are they in safe, public and well-lit areas so that women and girls can collect water on their own without disturbance.

name: handwash_location
label: Where do settlement residents go to wash their hands?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply

name: handwash_location_other
label: Specify other

name: handwash_device
label: What kind of handwashing device do most households usually use to wash their hands?
hint::English: A handwashing facility refers to a fixed or mobile device designed to contain, transport or regulate the flow of water to facilitate handwashing. They include sinks with tap water, buckets with taps, tippy-taps, and jugs or basins designated for handwashing as well as Aftaba

name: handwash_device_other
label: Specify other

name: soap_avail
label: Are soap AND water available for handwashing at most handwashing facilities?

name: handwash_time
label: Do MOST people in the settlement wash their hands at these times:

name: time_handwash_meal
label: Before preparing a meal?

name: time_handwash_toilet
label: After using the latrine or toilet?

name: time_handwash_return
label: After coming back from outside the home?

name: handwash_crowded
label: Has overcrowding at these handwashing facilities been an issue in the last 7 days?

name: water_distance
label: Is the main source of potable or drinking water for your settlement within 2 km of your settlement?

name: water_source
label: What is this source of potable or drinking water?

name: water_source_other
label: Specify other

name: water_barrier
label: Does your settlement face any barriers to accessing potable/drinking water?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'none' and any other option

name: water_barrier_other
label: Specify other

name: water_barrier_group
label: Are any specific groups more affected than others by these barriers?

name: water_barrier_who
label: Which groups are more affected?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'none' and any other option

name: water_barrier_who_other
label: Specify other

name: health
label: Health

name: health_note
label: Now I would like to ask about health centres available for your settlement, resident use of these centres and barriers you face in accessing them. I will also ask about resident wellbeing and stress.

name: health_distance
label: Is there an accessible health centre within 2 km of your settlement?

name: health_inaccess
label: Where do settlement residents seek treatment if they become sick or injured?

name: health_inaccess_other
label: Specify other

name: inaccess_distance
label: How long, in minutes by driving, would it take to travel to the nearest accessible health centre?

name: health_gbv
label: Does this health facility have female staff or health services to treat women and girls?

name: health_use_recent
label: In the last 3 months, has any resident of your settlement sought care at this health facility?

name: health_use_satisfy
label: Were they satisifed with the quality of the healthcare they received there?

name: health_use_unsatisfy
label: What about the service was not to their satisfaction?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'prefer not to answer' or 'don't know' and any other option

name: health_use_unsatisfy_other
label: Specify other

name: health_barrier
label: Did they face any barriers to accessing healthcare at this centre?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'none' and any other option

name: health_barrier_other
label: Specify other

name: health_barrier_group
label: Are any specific groups more affected than others by these barriers to healthcare?

name: health_barrier_who
label: Which groups are more affected?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'none' and any other option

name: health_barrier_who_other
label: Specify other

name: covid_coping
label: What behaviours, if any, have you observed in residents of your settlement to deal with the coronavirus outbreak?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'none' and any other option

name: covid_coping_other
label: Specify other

name: mhpss_aware
label: Are you aware of any community-based support available for people in your settlement suffering from stress or issues with wellbeing?

name: mhpss_services
label: What are these services?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply

name: mhpss_services_other
label: Specify other

name: mhpss_use
label: Are they being used by residents of your settlement?

name: mhpss_use_why
label: What is the main reason why MOST residents are not using these services?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'prefer not to answer' or 'don't know' and any other option

name: mhpss_use_why_other
label: Specify other

name: mhpss_secondary
label: What secondary impacts do you foresee for people in your settlement due to the coronavirus disease lockdown?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'none' and any other option

name: mhpss_secondary_other
label: Specify other

name: protection
label: Protection

name: protection_note
label: Now I would like to ask about safety and security in your settlement, including relationships with host community, sharing of services, and land use and eviction.

name: safe_likert
label: How would MOST people rate the safety and security from crime and conflict in your settlement in the past 3 months?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply

name: safety_change
label: Has the amount or severity of security incidents changed in the last 3 months?

name: safety_gbv
label: Has the amount or severity of security incidents against women and girls specifically changed in the last 3 months?

name: move_free_m
label: Are men and boys able to move freely in and out of the settlement?

name: move_why_m
label: Why are men unable to move freely?

name: move_why__m_other
label: Specify other

name: move_free_f
label: Are women and girls able to move freely in and out of the settlement?

name: move_why_f
label: Why are women unable to move freely?

name: move_why_f_other
label: Specify other

name: host_relation
label: How do you describe the social relationship between your settlement and the host community in your area?

name: relocation
label: Has the Government or local authorities made any efforts to relocate the households in this settlement or forced residents to leave in the last 2 years?

name: host_dispute
label: If a resident of your community had a serious dispute with somebody from the host community, who would they go to for help?
hint::English: Read options, select one

name: host_dispute_other
label: Specify other

name: comm_represent
label: Does your settlement have a community representation structure?

name: site_land
label: Do you know who owns the land on which this settlement sits?

name: site_land_owner
label: Who owns the land?

name: site_land_owner_other
label: Specify other

name: rent
label: Do residents have to pay any fees, monitary or in kind, to use the settlement land or live in shelters there?

name: eviction
label: In the last 3 months, have any households in your settlement experienced an eviction from their shelter?

name: eviction_why
label: For what reason have the majority of these evictions occurred?

name: eviction_why_other
label: Specify other

name: eviction_threat
label: In the last 3 months, have any households in your settlement been threatened with eviction from their shelter?

name: eviction_threat_other
label: Specify other

name: eviction_threat_why
label: In the last 3 months, who has been the source of these threats?

name: eviction_threat_why_other
label: Specify other

name: esnfi
label: ESNFI

name: shelter_note
label: Now I would like to ask you about the shelters and arrangements for living for most households.

name: shelter_type
label: What type of shelter do MOST people in your settlement live in?

name: shelter_type_other
label: Specify other

name: accom
label: What is the accommodation arrangement for most families in your settlement?
hint::English: Read options, select one

name: accom_other
label: Specify other

name: tenure
label: Is the most common type of agreement for occupying the living space used by households written, verbal, or no agreement at all?

name: tenure_written
label: What written document do most households posess?
hint::English: Read options, select one

name: tenure_written_other
label: Specify other

name: hh_rooms
label: What is the average number of rooms in most shelters in which household members sleep?
constraint_message::English: Number of rooms must be 10 or less

name: covid_shelter
label: If someone in your settlement becomes sick with symptoms of coronavirus, what kind of shelter or accommodation support would MOST households in your settlement prefer?
hint::English: Read options, select one

name: covid_shelter_other
label: Specify other

name: covid_sitespace
label: Do you have adequate land in your setlement where these additional facilities can be constructed or set up?

name: sim_card
label: Do MOST residents in your settlement have access to a sim card?

name: food_sec
label: Food Security and Livelihood

name: fsl_note
label: Now I would like to ask you about the markets used by residents, availability of items, and any aid distributions that happen in your settlement.

name: livelihood
label: Which income-generating activity do MOST people in your settlement engage in?

name: livelihood_other
label: Specify other

name: work_change
label: How has work for MOSTsettlement residents changed due to movement and economic restrictions related to health concerns in the last 3 months?

name: unemploy_coping
label: Are any of the following actions being taken by settlement residents as a result of lack of employment?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'don't know' and any other option

name: unemploy_coping_other
label: Specify other

name: market_walking
label: Is there an accessible market within 2 km of your settlement?

name: market_soldout
label: Have materials within this market sold out or become more difficult to find in the last 3 months?

name: soldout_item
label: Which materials have sold out or become harder to find?

name: soldout_item_other
label: Specify other

name: food_source
label: What are the main sources of food for people in the settlement?

name: food_source_other
label: Specify other

name: food_access
label: Have residents had sufficient access to food (financially) to meet the needs of their households in the past 3 months?

name: aap
label: Accountability to Affected Populations

name: aid_provided
label: Do humanitarian agencies provide services to any households living in this informal settlement?

name: aid_type
label: What types of services are provided?

name: aid_type_other
label: Specify other

name: aid_govt
label: Have there been efforts made by local government or authorities to inform or provide additonal services to your settlement in relation to coronavirus risks?

name: aid_services
label: What were those additional services?

name: aid_services_other
label: Specify other

name: education
label: Education

name: edu_note
label: Now I would quickly like to ask you about educational facilities used by the settlement. This is the last section.

name: school_distance
label: Is there an accessible school within 2 km of your settlement?

name: school_closed
label: Has this facility been closed in the last 3 months due to health concerns or movement restrictions?

name: school_alternatives
label: Are any other options for education available for children in your settlement?
hint::English: Read options, select all that apply
constraint_message::English: Cannot select 'no' or 'don't know' and any other option

name: school_alt_other
label: Specify other

name: thankyou
label: Thank you very much for participating in the survey. Over the next year, it is possible we would like to survey your settlement again. We will continue to contact you through the phone number used here if that is necessary for assessments. We hope you will contimue to support OFDA and REACH's efforts to provide suppor to sites like your own. Thank you.
